tool_description:
Make your onboarding process safer, faster, and smarter by verifying if your merchants are registered with the Registrar of Companies, and are registered with the same details that you expect.

With the MCA Verification API, you can now confidently onboard merchants knowing that they are authorized and registered with the RoC.
name: MCA Corporate Verifications
title: MCA Corporate Verifications

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: MCA Corporate Verifications
api_list.description:
Make your onboarding process safer, faster, and smarter by verifying if your merchants are registered with the Registrar of Companies, and are registered with the same details that you expect.

With the MCA Verification API, you can now confidently onboard merchants know...
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mca-corporate-verifications1.p.rapidapi.com/MCA/Detailed_search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mca-corporate-verifications1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://mca-corporate-verifications1.p.rapidapi.com/MCA/Detailed_search"

headers = {
